item.description:
From http://www.harvard.co...

"Back in the halcyon days of December 2008, Harvard Book Store first opened the doors of our Somerville warehouse for access to its trove of Bargain, Used, and Collector′s titles. This weekend, Saturday, June 26 and Sunday, June 27, we are excited to open the doors for the fourth time.

"Warm, lazy summer days are on the way, and now is the perfect time to stock the shelves with new and unusual finds. You may find a hardcover edition of a Hemingway classic, an out of print monograph by an obscure but brilliant artist, or a deal on a recent bestseller you′ve been meaning to read. The only way to find out is to stroll the aisles and take a look for yourself!"
item.name: Harvard Book Store Warehouse Sale
